Posts.Content: Sunflower13 wrote: I am looking for a doctor to discuss genetic counciling and prophylactic options in AZ. Has anyone used or know of Kimberli S. Cox at the Comprehensive Breast Center of AZ... If so, I would love any information. Thanks, Genevieve Sunflower13 Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Comprehensive Breast Center of AZ? Sunflower13 spongebob101

Posts.Content: Sunflower13 wrote: Hello,  I am a 20 year old in Arizona and I am very interested about being a previvor. I have family history, on both sides, of many types of cancer, including breast, ovarian, uterine, cervical, colon... Just to name a few. Knowing that the process of counseling and actually getting to surgery can take years I started my research about cancer before I even had breast and started research about preventative measures as soon as they were available. Does anyone know of a good resource here in AZ? I am not too concerned about genetic testing, as many people without BRCA1 or 2 still end up fighting the beast. Also, anyone on here choose prophylactic surgery without genetic testing? Anyone take preventative measures before having their children? Thanks so much for any answers! Sunflower13 Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Prophylatic Mastectomy Questions Sunflower13 Sunflower13

Posts.Content: Oct 5, 2010 11:16PM Sunflower13 wrote: Thanks Flash, I will be sure to find very informed professionals to help me deal with my risk. If anyone has gone through genetic counseling and/or preventative treatments and/or surgeries in AZ any information you have for me would be greatly appreciated!
